name: He Who Comes With the Dawn

chapters.title: Chapter 2: Rhuidean
chapters.info: He Who Comes With the Dawn, p. 76 (56)—According to the Aiel's Prophecy of Rhuidean, the man who will unite the clans of the Aiel and bring them out of the Three-Fold Land. With him, a “remnant of a remnant” will survive the Last Battle; without him, every Aiel alive will die. He Who Comes With the Dawn is said to come at dawn from Rhuidean, marked with two Dragons instead of one. See also al'Thor, Rand; Car'a'carn; Coramoor; Couladin; Dragon Reborn.
